title: Smart Data Models - Glass schema
description: Information on a given Glass of Building (Glass name, color, thermal conductivity, etc.)

type.description: Property. It must be equal to Glass

glassName.description: Property. Name of glass material such as tempered glass

glassSolarRadiationHeatAcquisitionRate.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Solar heat acquisition rate of glass material

glassThermalTransmission.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal transmission of glass material

glassVisibleLightTransmittance.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Visible light transmittance of glass material

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the window containing this item
